original_title: Two health workers arrested over patient’s death
original_body_lines: Two assistant health workers attached to the National Institute of Mental Health (NIMH) in Mulleriyawa have been arrested over the death of a patient at the NIMH recently, Police said.
According to reports, the two health workers had allegedly assaulted the patient, who was said to have suffered from bipolar disorder.
The deceased patient aged 48 years is a resident of Watareka.
Further investigations are being conducted by the Divisional Crime Detective Bureau of the Nugegoda Division.
